description: Prana Yoga and Dance Studio  added  2 new photos . CHAIR YOGA with Halle Saturday, November 4th 5:00-6:00pm  Chair yoga is the practice of modifying yoga poses so that they can be done while seated in a chair. In addition to a good stretch, chair yoga participants can also enjoy other health benefits of yoga, including improved muscle tone, better breathing habits, stress reduction, better sleep, and an overall sense of well-being.  So come take a seat at Prana and yogi with us! Best part, you won‚Äôt even have to stand up.  Register online or call!

description: St. Michael School  added  2 new photos . God Bless our students . . . especially our second graders and eighth graders as they receive their First Holy Communion and Confirmation.  Please keep them in your prayers. Brian Lepkowski

St. Michael School On November 28, St. Michael School is participating in We Give Catholic, an online day of Catholic Giving in Northeast Ohio. Please support our Catholic elementary school with your donation on that day by going to  WeGiveCatholic.org.  Once on the website, search for St. Michael School ‚Äì Independence.  Your donation will go a long way in helping the school enhance its STREAM (Science, Technology, Religion, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics) curriculum and programs.  Our students appreciate your ongoing support.  No computer? That's ok!  We are accepting checks written out to St. Michael School and dropped off at the main office or mailed to 6906 Chestnut Road, Independence, OH  44131.  Please put We Give Catholic in the memo line.
St. Michael School
St. Michael School A Salute to our Veterans

comments.content: Toni Perk Mannarino   Mike Ziccardi

description: St. Michael School Toni Perk Mannarino Mike Ziccardi

St. Michael School What a beautiful day of service spent in the sun last Friday! The 8th graders raked two neighborhood lawns as part of their acts of service and Random Acts of Christian Example (R.A.C.E. to be Saints).    With the generosity of several parents, we were also able to gift a small banana bread and a quart of apple cider at the neighbor's houses along with a prayer card made by the students. We also gave banana bread and a prayer card to an unsuspecting UPS worker, Benny, and the mailman, too!  The students enjoyed their evangelizing without realizing they were evangelizing!    Thank you to Mrs. Fossa and Mrs. Gallucci for accompanying us and helping out with not only raking but serving the students some well-deserved snacks after their hard work.

St. Michael School  added  2 new photos . No school today!  That's ok - it's the perfect day to read, read, read and support the St. Michael School PTU's Read-a-Thon... the Misso children are doing just that!  Let's see your pictures!  Email them to communications@stmichaelschoolinfo.com and we will post them throughout the day.  Enjoy your day off everyone!    https://99pledges.com/fund/stmichaels

description: St. Michael School St. Michael School is closed today, November 6, 2017, due to no electricity and down power lines in Brecksville.  Brecksville-Broadview Hts. City School has closed and therefore, St. Michael School is closed. (Main and St. Basil Campus)  This message was sent out as a phone message through "One Call Know." If you did not receive the call, please let the office know on our next school day. It was also posted on the television stations and our school website.

description: Prana Yoga and Dance Studio We will be offering a 10:00am Barre Class on Labor Day! Only class offered that day!   Raise the Barre Fitness Challenge Begins September 12th!  .  4 weeks Unlimited Barre Classes  Clients must take a minimum of 5 classes a week  Cost is $100  Raise the Barre Challenge is back! PASSES are now on SALE!   The Raise the Barre Challenge will begin Monday September 12th ‚ÄìSunday October 9th  Everyone needs to challenge themselves, whether you need to lose those last 5 pounds, or start a new fitness program, This is for you! This is not a weight loss challenge. However, we encourage our participants to eat a clean diet and encourage them to give up their vices for the challenge. Reduced consumption of sugar, alcohol, etc.  For our Raise the Barre Challenge, clients must take a minimum of 5 classes a week.  Cost for your unlimited pass is $100. All clients who finish the Barre challenge will receive a FREE 12 class card pass of our Ballet Barre classes! That means each participant must complete 5 classes weekly to qualify for the prize. The value of a 12 card pass is $84. Your 12 card pass you receive from completing the challenge will expire after 1 month starting October 10th.Current pass holders may put their current pass on hold.  Raise the BARRE Challenge Schedule  Monday 10:00-11:00am Hot Barre  Monday 7:00-8:00pm Barre Burn  Tuesday 9:30-10:30am Barre Basics   Tuesday 6:00-7:00pm Intermediate Barre  Wednesday 10:00-11:00am Intermediate Barre  Wednesday 5:30-6:15pm Core Barre  Thursday 10:00-11:00am Core Barre  Friday 9:30-10:30am Barre Burn  Friday 5:30-6:15pm Core Barre  Saturday 8:00-9:00am Barre Basics  Saturday 9:00-10:00am Barre Burn  Sunday 10:00-11:00am Barre Burn Laura Yax
Prana Yoga and Dance Studio And more shirts

description: Prana Yoga and Dance Studio  added  2 new photos . CHAIR YOGA with Halle Saturday, November 4th 5:00-6:00pm  Chair yoga is the practice of modifying yoga poses so that they can be done while seated in a chair. In addition to a good stretch, chair yoga participants can also enjoy other health benefits of yoga, including improved muscle tone, better breathing habits, stress reduction, better sleep, and an overall sense of well-being.  So come take a seat at Prana and yogi with us! Best part, you won‚Äôt even have to stand up.  Register online or call!

comments.content: Oh good lord. Where do I begin?!

I hope you like it!!!
